panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together

targets.expr: (sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode!="idle"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[5m])))) * 100

panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: Guest - Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest operating system

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job", mode="nice"}[1m])) / on(instance) sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$node",job="$job"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: GuestNice - Time spent running a niced guest  (virtual CPU for guest operating system)
